content: and establishing magic loop row 2 ws sl-wyif p to last st sl-wyif half way across instep pm and pick up and k16 sts from heel selvedge k9 and pull sts onto cable the middle of the 18 repeat these two row 15 more times heel sts center back heel is now the new beginning of the round continue keeping magic loop as established turn heel dpn & magic loop directions row 1 rs k17 ssk k1 turn round 1 k to 3 sts from marker k2tog k1 work across instep row 2 ws sl-wyif p5 p2tog p1 turn sts in established pattern to next marker slip marker k1 ssk row 3 sl-wyib k until there is 1 st before the gap ssk k to end 2 sts decreased k1 turn round 2 work in established pattern to end row 4 sl-wyif p until there is 1 st before the gap p2tog p1 turn repeat rnds 1 & 2 until 65 total sts remain 2 right sock only k sts from needle 1 onto needle 4 sl sts from needle 2 round 1 k to 3 sts from first marker k2tog k1 work instep onto needle 3 there will now be the same number of sts sts in established pattern k to end 1 st decreased on each needle 6 sts on top needle and 6 on bottom left sock only toe magic loop directions round 1 k to second marker slipping first marker and keeping switch to cc instep sts in pattern k1 ssk k to end 1 st decreased knit one round removing all markers shifting the last instep 64 sts rem stitch onto the needle which contains the foot sts foot dpn & magic loop directions knit across the 16 foot stitches of the next round and draw continue in established pattern until foot measures approx up your needle to create a new beginning of round arrange 2 / 5 cm less than desired foot length stitches so that 32 instep stitches are on one needle shaft while remaining instep stitch and foot sts are on the other toe dpn directions switch to cc round 1 first needle *k1 ssk k to 3 sts before end of needle shaft k2tog k1 repeat from * on second needle shaft knit one round shifting the last instep stitch onto the needle round 2 k to end which contains the foot sts you should now have 32 sts for the top of the toe and 32 sts for the bottom repeat rnds 1 & 2 until 32 sts rem repeat round 1 only until 12 sts rem 6 remaining original instep sts are on one needle shaft round 1 needle 1 k to last 3 sts k2tog k1 needle 2 k1 ssk and 6 remaining original toe sts are on one needle shaft k to end needle 3 k to last 3 sts k2tog k1 needle 4 k1 ssk k to end 4 sts decreased finishing round 2 k to
